title: Dark Harvest's slot should be replaced with an entirely new rune.
body:
I say this because there is already an **_add to your burst_** rune, eletrocute. They fit the same exact playstyle so it will always be "which is stronger?" Predator does something entirely different and fills its own niche, and so should the rune in dark harvest's slot.

Infinitely stacking damage by playing the game with a rune is awful design also, and ruins skirmish modes like ARAM and blitz where you pop it an extreme amount more times than it's balance to be popped.

replies.body: Better idea, remove keystones and bring back s5 masteries and runes.

Honestly this new rune system can be made to work, but it needs a few good changes.

 These stat shards need to be more emphasized, for one, instead of getting 10 armor and only that. 

Scaling runes should be capped, like overgrowth. There is no need to have infinite power from bringing a rune. SOA old keystone is like the not busted overgrowth because it capped.

I could on in a different post, but this thread was made for dark harvest specifically.

its a 2.5% max health bonus at 120 minions. even sion and chogath dont break 250 health on this thing by lategame anymore.

the rune is already complete trash. scaling runes, especially health are fine in concept. they dont provide immediate impact, and were only an investment for later stages at the game, at the cost of early power. right now, overgrowth is a scaling rune that you give up early power for, and that just doesnt scale anymore. there is literally no point in picking this.

the way games are currently paced, theyre usually 14 minutes lane phase and then everything explodes and the game ends within 10 min, because turret plating gold is way overtuned, and turrets are even weaker than last season once the plating falls off.

if anything, overgrowth needs a real hefty buff to get its scaling back. it should grant 3% max health every 120 minions and not just 2.5% once. even if you reverted it, with how snowbally and shorter games are, the runes is questionable at best. it would probably have to be buffed further than last season to even make it worth considering in an environment where games are shorter.
Or maybe if they cap it, they can give it those hefty buffs?

Nah I’d rather they merge the two: Electrocute’s non infinite damage scaling and DH’s method of proccing. 

I really find the execute thing much better than electrocute’s combo restriction, you can use it in a team and it can be balanced around having a lower amount of damage (because it’s more reliable), and it encourages the assassin “clean up” playstyle and not the “3 hit 100-0” playstyle

It’s just not good when a rune is usable only in a burst combo to make it burstier in a meta with so much quick damage already. For a lot of its users DH functions as making harass stronger to those at a lower health as well, which makes it flexible without needing extreme numbers. But at the same time it’s not like comet which I think has other problems in that it’s undodgeable, but still has a telegraphed use case that lets you prevent that damage (respect their range when you’re lower)

If anything, replace electrocute with new DH. DH actually changes my mindset playing the game, as I start to care about my stacks and play noticably more aggressive for kills than I normally have had, with Kayn. Dark Harvest only scales well with it's souls, otherwise Electrocute beats it, so you actively need to be playing aggressive to keep it scaling, unlike Electrocute.
I'd like runes removed and riot balance each champ accordingly  so that we can actually achieve a balanced game

The entire rune system needs changed. We need runes tailored for each individual champion reminiscent of the augment system from onslaught instead of our current one-size-fits-all system where a rune abuser either gets the rune nerfed for everyone else or they themself get nerfed specifically for their synergy with that rune and thus become dependent on it (which stiffles player choice)

Dark harvest is a bad design rune, not only it is similar to electrocute but also easier to proc which only require to hit someone under 50% hp which can be activate by stuff like dot. Let not forget that you no longer require to collect the soul but instead get it free when you proc it.
